name: Synthetic Data Quality (Pattern)
description: An argument pattern for assuring quality of synthetic data

goals.name: G1
goals.short_description: The synthetic data generated meets the required quality standards for its intended use.

strategies.name: S1
strategies.short_description: Fidelity—ensure synthetic data accurately reflects the statistical properties and distributions of the original dataset.

property_claims.name: P1
property_claims.short_description: The mean, variance, and correlation of synthetic data closely match those of the original dataset.

property_claims.name: P2
property_claims.short_description: Visual inspection of synthetic and original data distributions shows high similarity.

strategies.name: S2
strategies.short_description: Diversity—ensure the synthetic data encompasses a wide range of scenarios, including rare or edge cases, to accurately represent the variability in the real dataset.

property_claims.name: P3
property_claims.short_description: The synthetic data includes representations of all known edge cases in the original dataset.

strategies.name: S3
strategies.short_description: Privacy—ensure the synthetic data protects sensitive information and prevents re-identification of individuals.

property_claims.name: P4
property_claims.short_description: Synthetic data generation incorporates differential privacy techniques to minimise re-identification risks.

property_claims.name: P5
property_claims.short_description: Re-identification risk assessments confirm that the risk of identifying individuals from the synthetic data is below acceptable thresholds.

strategies.name: S4
strategies.short_description: Utility—ensure the synthetic data is useful for its intended application, such as training machine learning models or analysis.

property_claims.name: P6
property_claims.short_description: Model trained on synthetic data achieves performance metrics within an acceptable range of those trained on original data.

property_claims.name: P7
property_claims.short_description: Domain experts confirm the synthetic data is realistic and meets the needs of the intended application.
